Field Annotation:
@HIDDEN
@CALCTEXT(

if(
[hiv_test_today_result]='1' or
[da_hiv_test_today_result]='1' or
[da_hiv_test_today_result][previous-instance]='1' or
[da_hiv_test_today]='3' or
[da_hiv_test_today][previous-instance]='3',
'No, living with HIV', 

if(
[da_hiv_test_today][current-instance]='1',
'No, testing today',

if(   

([hiv_test_today]='1' and [hiv_test_today_result]<>'1'
    
    and
    
    (datediff(
    
    [da_date][first-instance],[da_date][current-instance], 'd')=0 or 
    
    datediff(
    
    [da_date][first-instance],[da_date][current-instance], 'd')='')

    and 
    
    datediff([date],[da_date][current-instance], 'd')>=90) 
    
    or 

([hiv_test_today]<>'1' 

    and 
    
    (datediff(
    
    [da_date][first-instance],[da_date][current-instance], 'd')=0 or 
    
    datediff(
    
    [da_date][first-instance],[da_date][current-instance], 'd')=''))

    or
    
([hiv_test_today]<>'1' 
    
    and 
    
    [da_hiv_test_today_result][previous-instance]<>'1'  
    
    and 
    
    datediff([da_date][previous-instance],[da_date][current-instance], 'd')>=90)
    or

([hiv_test_today]='1' 

    and 
    
    [hiv_test_today_result]<>'1'
    
    and 
    
    [da_hiv_test_today_result][previous-instance]<>'1' 
    
    and 
    
    datediff([da_date][previous-instance],[da_date][current-instance], 'd')>=90),
    
    'Yes', 

'No, tested less than 90 days ago'))))
